name: Backgammon, Chess & Checkers
description: Play either backgammon, chess or checkers against a virtual opponent, in a courtyard setting. Play on desktop or in VR.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better, Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer
